channel.title: Credentials on Malicious Link
channel.description: Recent content in Credentials on Malicious Link

item.title: Powershell Popups + Capture
item.description: Metasploit Minute has entered into it’s 3rd “season”. And we kick it off with using the Metasploit capture modules to capture creds from this powershell popup. The cool thing about this is you can leave it to execute on a system without any other code on disk and get creds constantly as any level of user. No admin, no UAC bypass needed. Just a bunch of creds for free.. over SSL.
